resources.string: If the remaining group size drops below {minGroupSize} members, the group will be removed from the queue.\n\nAre you sure?

Your duel ended in a draw.

<font color="#ffe940">Outpost Rush</font> is a 20 vs 20 match that takes place on a large island with three Outposts.\nPlayers compete to capture and hold these Outposts for as long as possible, increasing their team's score in the process.
Capture and hold Outposts to increase your team's score
The first team to reach a score of 1000 wins
Utilize special resources on the island to attack & defend
I would like to join matches in progress <font color="#ffe940">(Shorter wait time)</font>
You are currently in a group and cannot join as a solo player
You are not currently in a group
You currently have a pending group invite
You cannot sign up because you are already signed up for an upcoming war that starts within the next hour.
You cannot sign up because you are currently signed up for {matchname}
You cannot sign up because you are currently in queue for an expedition.
All group members must be at least level {levelRequirement}.
One or more of your group members are signed up for an upcoming war that starts within the next hour.
One or more of your group members are signed up for another event.
One or more of your group members are dead.
One or more of your group members are offline.
One or more of your group members have a penalty timer for leaving a previous Outpost Rush match.
One or more of your group members did not respond to the invitation.
Since you left mid-match, a penalty is applied
You won't be able to add any additional group members once your group is in the queue.
Your group has been removed from the queue for Outpost Rush.
You have been invited to Outpost Rush!
The enemy team's score is frozen for <font color="#ffea00">3 minutes</font>!
Your team's score is frozen for <font color="#ffea00">3 minutes</font>!
Command Post in {value} has been built
Command Post in {value} has been upgraded to Tier {tier}
Are you sure you want to leave the Outpost Rush queue?
Are you sure you want to leave Outpost Rush?
Are you sure you want to leave Outpost Rush?\nYou will be unable to queue for Outpost Rush again for {time}.
Are you sure you want to join another group?\nLeaving your group will cause you to leave Outpost Rush.\nYou will be unable to queue for Outpost Rush again for {time}.
Capture outposts and slay the enemy to score points. First team to 1000 points wins!
Gather infused wood, ore, and hides to upgrade your outposts by building gates and siege weapons. Build a command post to gain powerful offensive and defensive boosts for your team.
Use summoning stones to summon powerful allies at summoning circles. Summon a bear by buying a stone from the armory or gain an ultra-powerful brute ally by donating Azoth at the corrupted portal.
Baroness Hain is the ghost of a long dead noble that haunts the island. Slay her to gain a powerful buff that increases the defense of your team and freezes the enemy score!
<font color="#ffe294">Player level {level}</font> is required to participate in Outpost Rush.
Use a Summoning Stone at this obelisk to add a monstrous ally to your team for a limited time.
Pinning/Unpinning objectives disabled while in Outpost Rush.
Outposts earn 1 point every 3 seconds held. Kills are worth 2 points each.
Capture an outpost by standing in the circle at the center.
Capture and hold Outposts & defeat enemy players to increase your teamâ€™s score.
PUT 500 AZOTH ESSENCE IN CORRUPTED PORTAL
Put in the 500th Azoth Essence to receive a Corrupted Summoning Stone.
Kill her for a powerful defense buff, and freeze the enemy team's score for 3 minutes.
Kill her for a powerful defense buff, and freeze the enemy team's score for 3 minutes..
Collect infused wood and ore, then interact with the gate to build and upgrade it.
It will allow your team to respawn here, and prevent the enemy team from capturing the outpost.
Collect infused wood, ore, and hide, then interact with the siege weapon to build or repair it.
Collect infused wood and ore, then interact with the command post to build and upgrade it.
Collect infused wood, ore, and hide from the azoth infused trees, rocks and wolves found all over the map to build this structure.
Interact with the armory to spend your Azoth on a variety of useful items.
GET AZOTH ESSENCE FROM KILLING MONSTERS
Once you have gathered Azoth Essence, interact with the armory to spend it.
YOU HAVE LOTS OF AZOTH ESSENCE
Head to any outpost your team controls and gear up at the Armory.
Interact with the obelisk on the summoning circle to summon a powerful ally.
Get to an unoccupied summoning circle to summon a powerful ally.
Buy one at the armory, defeating Ug or Dug at the mines, or donate 500 Azoth Essence to the Corrupted Portal.
GET A SUMMONING STONE AND TRY AGAIN
Buy one at the armory, defeating Ug or Dug at the mines, or donate 500 Azoth Essence to the Corrupted Portal.
SUMMONING CIRCLE CAN'T BE USED AGAIN YET
Try a different one, or wait until this one is available again.
Unable to use Emote in this game mode
You are in an Outpost Rush, your equipment was not damaged upon death.
You are in a war(or invasion), your equipment was not damaged upon death.
All the equipment in your inventory was damaged upon death.
You were killed by another player, your equipment took reduced damage.
